Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Model.Game.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientPlayer, Serializable
public class Player extends Object implements Serializable, ClientPlayer
This class represents a player in the game

    • Player

      public Player(String username, Manuscript manuscript, PawnColour pawnColour)
      constructor for the player entity
      Parameters:

      manuscript - player's personal manuscript
      pawnColour - player's pawn colour

  • Method Details

    • addCard

      public void addCard(Game game, Card card, Face face, int x, int y)
      Actually adds the card on the manuscript, covering the corners involved and counts them. Updates the manuscript's counters. Then, calculate the points earned and add them to the board.
      Parameters:
      game - game
      card - which card
      face - face up or face down
